site.heroTitle: Objective Type Questions that prepare students for Boards, CUET & Olympiads

heroHighlights: Perfect for CBSE Class XII, CUET, Olympiads & competitive exams

about.subtitle: One place for concept clarity, exam-oriented practice and teacher-friendly resources.
paragraphs: Learning Tree Edusolutions brings together experienced Business Studies teachers and paper-setters to create focused resources for senior secondary students.

Our flagship series, 'Objective Type Questions in Business Studies – Class XII', is aligned with the latest CBSE syllabus and circulars. It gives students structured practice in the exact formats that appear in exams: MCQs, case-based questions, assertion–reason, statement correction, true/false, fill in the blanks and more.
We work closely with school teachers, workshop participants and contributors from reputed schools to keep our content practical, classroom-tested and up-to-date.

author.name: R. K. Mahajan
author.note: Best wishes for your academic and competitive success. With the right practice, every student can feel confident answering objective type questions.

books.subtitle: Books you can directly buy from Amazon or your preferred marketplace.

items.title: Objective Type Questions on Business Studies – Class XII
description: Why buy multiple books when one comprehensive guide can serve all your needs?
This book is thoughtfully designed to support your CBSE Board examination preparation and also serves as a valuable resource for CUET, Olympiads and other competitive exams.
bullets: NCERT-based: aligned with NCERT text, phrases and vocabulary for seamless understanding.
Expert authors: prepared by experienced Business Studies authors and reviewers with decades of classroom experience.
Tailored content: includes deleted topics list for CBSE students and additional content for CUET aspirants.
Extensive practice: 3000+ practice questions in MCQs, case-based MCQs, assertion–reason, statement correction, true/false, fill in the blanks and one-word/one-sentence answer formats.
contributors: Ms Akanksha Garg, Vishwa Bharti Public School, Noida (U.P.)
Ms Mridula Chawla, Shiv Vani Model School, Dwarka, New Delhi
Ms Parul Jain, Navy Children School, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi

Mr Sameer Bhatia, Maxfort School, Rohini, New Delhi
Ms Sumathy Raghunath, HOD Commerce, Cambridge School, Noida, U.P.
Ms Varsha Khajanchi, Manav Rachna International School, Faridabad

testimonials.booksTitle: Testimonials – Text Books on Business Studies
testimonials.booksSubtitle: What teachers and students say about the core Business Studies textbooks.

booksItems.name: Ms Santvana Charuvedi
booksItems.message: Hearty congratulations Mahajan Sirji. You are a very dedicated, hardworking, caring and focused author who takes care of all aspects and current updates. Perfection is one word that defines your work. I feel blessed to be associated with you and foresee many more such moments of pride and honour.

booksItems.name: Mr Rajesh Kumar
booksItems.role: SB Vidyalaya, Pitam Pura, New Delhi
booksItems.message: I have received specimen copy of Business Studies by R.K. Mahajan Sir and gone through it. Excellent book in all aspects. 5* for Mahajan Sir. Please bring Hindi medium also so that students of government schools can get the benefit of your hard work.

booksItems.name: Dr Vikas Vijay
booksItems.role: Formerly PGT (Commerce), New Era Public School, Maya Puri, New Delhi
booksItems.message: I know Mr Rajesh Kumar Mahajan from last five years. He has a different fire and spark. Apart from having an ace command over the subject he is an emotional, honest and sincere person. His Business Studies book is a master stroke – teacher-student friendly, with strong content and style of writing.

booksItems.name: Mr Piyush R. Mehta
booksItems.message: Your Business Studies books for Classes XI and XII appealed to me a lot. Simple language and use of pictures at various places make topics interesting and easy to understand. You have made right use of the maxim ‘A picture is worth a thousand words’.

booksItems.name: Ms Surabhi Sinha
booksItems.role: PGT (Commerce), Mother’s Global School, Preet Vihar, New Delhi
booksItems.message: Your books are complete in all aspects – good for both teachers and students. Lessons are planned in a very systematic way. Value based questions and very short answer questions cover everything. Addendum contains good case studies. Class XI book is excellent – simple language, systematic progress and different categories of questions covering the whole chapter.

booksItems.name: Ms Arti Chopra
booksItems.role: PGT (Commerce), Ryan International School, Mayur Vihar, New Delhi
booksItems.message: I wholeheartedly congratulate Mr Rajesh Kumar Mahajan for Business Studies books which present various concepts in simplified manner with day-to-day examples. Content is sufficient, questions and suggested answers are appreciable and especially helpful for government school students where language is a barrier.

booksItems.name: Ms Madhumita Saha
booksItems.message: The books cover all topics in a clear and structured manner with a good range of question typologies. They are extremely helpful for classroom teaching as well as exam preparation and will soon become best sellers among Business Studies resources.

testimonials.otqTitle: Testimonials – Objective Type Questions on Business Studies (OTQ Book)
testimonials.otqSubtitle: Feedback specifically for the ‘Objective Type Questions on Business Studies – Class XII’ book.

otqItems.name: Leena Arora
otqItems.message: This book shows how you have made things easier for students in Business Studies. Your resolute efforts call for great appreciation. You are a true educationist, sir. Hats off to your spirit.

otqItems.name: Suman Khanna
otqItems.role: HOD Commerce, Ramjas School R.K. Puram, New Delhi
otqItems.message: Received the specimen copy of your book on OTQs and found it immensely useful for students. It will enhance the speed of answering OTQs and help them score more than 20 marks. Recommended to my students and in the official book list – a very good purchase for concept building, clarity and revision.

otqItems.name: Ms Meenakshi Deewan
otqItems.role: Ramjas School, Pusa Road, New Delhi
otqItems.message: We have recommended your OTQ book to our students and plan to add it to the official book list. It is a complete material on which we can blindly rely for board preparation.

otqItems.name: Ms Mamta Srivastava
otqItems.role: PGT (Commerce), Delhi Public School, Mathura Road, New Delhi
otqItems.message: This book is just what I was looking for. A great way to quickly understand the Class XII syllabus with a large variety of OTQs as per latest CBSE pattern. Students can first understand the chapter from this book and then revise from NCERT.

otqItems.name: Ms Neena Batra
otqItems.message: OTQs on Business Studies cover all types of questions chapter-wise according to NCERT syllabus and help students revise full syllabus. By doing these, students can score full marks in board exams. All teachers should recommend this book.

otqItems.name: Ms Sangeeta Vashisth
otqItems.role: HOD Commerce, The Mann School, New Delhi
otqItems.message: The specimen OTQ book is wonderful – all varieties of MCQs students need to practise. One-word and case-based questions prepare students for concept clarity and long answers. You have covered weak areas very well.

otqItems.name: Ms Meenakshi Mishra
otqItems.role: HOD Business Studies Department, Vivekanand School, New Delhi
otqItems.message: The book completely covers revision of all aspects and weak areas of every chapter. A vast collection of case studies enables concept clarity – making the mission of scoring 95+ achievable.

otqItems.name: Anjali
otqItems.role: Air Force Bal Bharti, Lodhi Road, New Delhi
otqItems.message: All the questions are very conceptual and require proper thinking. Some are linked with current market situations. Answers of reason-based questions are given with full clarity.

otqItems.name: Bela Sharma
otqItems.role: Army Public School, Shankar Vihar, New Delhi
otqItems.message: It’s an amazing effort. Quality and content will really benefit everyone as all aspects of the chapters are covered from every possible angle.

otqItems.name: Deepali Gupta
otqItems.message: Quality of questions is commendable; they relate theoretical concepts with real-life situations. Proper explanation with correct reasoning makes this a complete list of OTQs.
